name: Space Maze
description: That is a real VR-action full of mysteries, awesome graphics and the sense of flight! Welcome to the Space Maze!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 449 MB available space Additional Notes: This game requires use of VR equipment such as the Oculus Rift.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 449 MB available space Additional Notes: This game requires use of VR equipment such as the Oculus Rift.
